```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r load_data}
recap_data <- read_excel("All Recaps Dec 9 2021.xls") 
band_data <- read_excel("All bands Dec 9 2021.xls") %>% 
  rename(Net = `Net/box`)

all_data <- recap_data %>% 
  full_join(band_data)  %>% # join recap and band data 
  mutate(Time = str_split_fixed(Time, " ", 2)[,2]) # only keep time (not [incorrect] date) **Potential problem point**


all_data <- all_data %>% 
  rename(banding_date = `Banding Date`, recapture_date = `Recapture Date`, how_captured = `How Captured`, band_number = `Band Number`, wing_chord = `Wing Chord`) %>% 
  mutate(net_number = as.numeric(Net))

```

```{r}
birds_per_net <- all_data %>% 
  group_by(net_number) %>% 
  summarize(num_birds= n()) %>% # total number of birds caught in each net
  filter(num_birds > 1, !is.na(net_number))

birds_per_net


all_data %>% 
  group_by(net_number, Species) %>% 
  summarize(num_birds= n())
```
